abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on the Roots Cafe in South Park Slope, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: A sign in Roots Cafe, in the South Slope in Brooklyn, conveys the cafe’s motto: “He who enters here is a stranger but once.”

headline.main: A Cozy Living Room With a Barista: Roots Cafe in the South Slope
headline.print_headline: A Cozy Living Room With a Barista

snippet: A sign in Roots Cafe, in the South Slope in Brooklyn, conveys the cafe’s motto: “He who enters here is a stranger but once.”
